content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=””][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”remove-margin”][vc_column_text]

Fiberoptic Handpieces

Accu-Beam® Fiberoptic Handpieces can be used with contact laser fibers in a variety of procedures including orthopedic, general surgery, neurosurgery, ENT, and oral surgery. They are re-usable, sterilizable, cost-effective, and come in a variety of shapes and sizes.

Our standard Fiberoptic Handpieces come in straight, 45° angle, offset, curved, spatula tip, and malleable configurations. They are available in 11, 12, 14, and 16 gauge sizes at varying lengths. For resellers and bulk orders customization is available.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”72538″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1444503683289{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e2e2e2″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=”” el_class=”dotted”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1569437782001{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72895″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/fiberoptic-handpieces/straight/” css=”.vc_custom_1581364925332{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581589790994{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Straight Handpieces

Rigid handpieces in a standard straight configuration. Available in various sizes and lengths.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72548″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/fiberoptic-handpieces/shaped/” css=”.vc_custom_1581364948822{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581589727338{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Shaped Handpieces

Rigid handpieces configured to be curved, offset, 45° angle, or spatula tip. Available in various sizes and lengths.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72552″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/fiberoptic-handpieces/malleable/” css=”.vc_custom_1581364971874{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581589698637{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Malleable Handpieces

Malleable handpieces that can be shaped and reformed during surgery. Available in various sizes and lengths.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72902″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/fiberoptic-handpieces/custom/” css=”.vc_custom_1581364993116{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581620334012{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Custom Handpieces

For resellers and bulk orders handpieces can be made to your specification of color, shape, size, and length. Custom laser engraving is available.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
